German l10n.

Merge pull request #22 from rwetzlmayr/l10n-de

German l10n w/ additional string from Grunthos' fork for 4.1.1 and a few...

Fix 'read' dates imported from goodreads

By default these come in an english unix long style; we now convert them
to sql format as part of the import (or leave them blank if they cannot
be parsed)

Fixes to rotation when editing and to date parsing

- now handles rotation correctly when editing book notes or book loan
- if in non-english locale, also try parsing imported dates in 'EN'
locale (this is important for goodreads)
